sections.heading: Information We Collect
content: We do not collect or store any personally identifiable information such as name, email, location, or contact details.
The app does not use analytics, advertising, or tracking services. No usage data is transmitted to third parties or analyzed for marketing purposes.

Preferences and information are stored solely on your device, including: selected button color theme and fetch time, selected affirmation category and fetch time, last audio recording filename (if used), the app’s first launch date, and any remote content fetched for offline use.
If you use audio recording features, audio files are stored only on your device and never uploaded or shared.
With your permission, the app may send you push notifications. Notification permissions are managed in your device settings.

sections.heading: How Information Is Collected
content: Theme and affirmation data are downloaded from public JSON files hosted on GitHub. No personal data is transmitted during these fetches.
App preferences are stored locally using @AppStorage and UserDefaults.
Audio files recorded within the app are saved locally in your device’s application support directory.
Microphone and notification permissions are optional and can be enabled or disabled at any time.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
content: To remember your preferences for a personalized experience.
To provide features like color themes, affirmations, journaling streaks, audio recording/playback, and reminders.
To ensure smooth functionality and offline access to previously fetched data.

sections.heading: Data Sharing and Disclosure
content: We do not share, sell, or disclose your data to any third parties.
All data remains on your device and is not accessible to us or anyone else.
Audio recordings, preferences, and fetched content stay entirely local.

sections.heading: Data Security
content: All local data is securely stored on your device.
Audio recordings are protected using the device’s built-in file protection.
No sensitive personal data is ever collected or processed.

sections.heading: Children’s Privacy
content: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
If you believe a child has submitted personal data, please contact us so we can remove it.

sections.heading: Your Choices
content: You can review and change your app settings at any time.
You may enable or disable microphone and notification access in device settings.
Uninstalling the app deletes all locally stored data.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. All changes will be reflected in the app along with an updated effective date.
